00028 #ifndef ABSTRACTCANCERTESTSUITE_HPP_
00029 #define ABSTRACTCANCERTESTSUITE_HPP_
00030 #define CXXTEST_ABORT_TEST_ON_FAIL
00031 #include "SimulationTime.hpp"
00032 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00033 #include "TissueConfig.hpp"
00034 
00040 class AbstractCancerTestSuite : public CxxTest::TestSuite
00041 {
00042 protected:
00043 
00047     void setUp()
00048     {
00049         //The following won't work.  It returns from this setup method, but not the test suite
00050         //EXIT_IF_PARALLEL; // defined in PetscTools
00051 
00052         SimulationTime::Instance()->SetStartTime(0.0);
00053         RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->Reseed(0);
00054         TissueConfig::Instance()->Reset();
00055     }
00056 
00060     void tearDown()
00061     {
00062         SimulationTime::Destroy();
00063         RandomNumberGenerator::Destroy();
00064     }
00065 };
